desc: BrainStormProducts, LLC is an USA based maker of outdoor toys, kites for kids and adults, collectible glass figurines & miniatures, outdoor décor, and reusable vinyl & polyester tablecloths for folding tables. BrainstormProducts.com is the home for our X Kites®, WindNSun®, TableClothPLUS™, and LookingGlass® brands.
